Hi, this is the first time I write here, I couldn't find this in previuos discussions..
I had memory problems with large files, so a tried saving the workbook in a temp folder then opening again and keep inserting rows.
in the middle, I disconect and unset the $objectexcel

the problem is that if I do this, once Ive wrote the first excel, when I load it IT'S EMPTY!
but now the interesting thing.. the next time it works fine and loads the previous rows fine!

so, i loose the first rows I wrote.. and its inside a loop so its the exact same code..

any ideas?

please, forgive my writing, english is not my first languaje
